tips.content: Now you are ready to start solving and creating!
Click and drag tp fill multiple squares!
The 4-square segment could be in placed either...
Either way, these 3 squares are always filled:
Each number shows how long a line segment of filled squares in the current row or column there should be.
Fill all squares as shown by the numbers.
Each segment must be separated by at least one empty square.
If you know a square can not be filled, it helps to mark it with an X.
Did you konw you can use the Spacebar to switch between filled spaces and Xs?
